name: orduni

body.origin:
|- wi(word(c0), word(cuni(c0)))
-| wi(word(c0), wss(c0, con0))
-| wi(wss(c0, con0), word(cuni(c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Ord(c0)→ Ord(⋃ c0))
⊣ (Ord(c0)→ c0 ⊆ On)
⊣ (c0 ⊆ On → Ord(⋃ c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(word(c0), word(cuni(c0)))
-| wi(word(c0), wss(c0, con0))
-| wi(wss(c0, con0), word(cuni(c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (Ord(c0)→ Ord(⋃ c0))
⊣ (Ord(c0)→ c0 ⊆ On)
⊣ (c0 ⊆ On → Ord(⋃ c0))

comment: The union of an ordinal class is ordinal. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2003.)
